Summary:
XWiki is a flexible and reliable Enterprise Wiki, allowing organizations of all sizes to better collaborate and exchange information in a timely and cost-effective manner. XWiki makes use of all the features you would expect from an Enterprise Wiki. Ergonomic WYSIWYG Editing, Page linking, History and rollback, User and rights management, File attachments, Macros, and advanced search using the Apache SOLR engine, just to name a few. XWiki's solution can be used to share information inside a team, and to build Knowledge Bases for support, sales, or HR teams. If projects become complex, XWiki can comply with the requirements and turn into a real, collaborative solution, be it as a full Intranet, extranet, or information-sharing website.
